function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of expensive materials such as copper","Impact":"Increased construction costs","Mitigation":"Consider alternative materials or explore cost-effective copper substitutes","Technologies":"Research and development of cost-effective copper substitutes","People":"Investors, developers, construction companies","Owner":"Investors, developers, construction companies"},{"Description":"Reduction in capacity of services due to social distancing measures","Impact":"Decreased efficiency and increased wait times","Mitigation":"Explore alternative crowd management strategies and optimize workflow processes","Technologies":"Smart crowd management systems, workflow optimization software","People":"Building managers, service providers","Owner":"Building managers, service providers"},{"Description":"Dependence on the continuation of the risk of transmission for social distancing measures","Impact":"Uncertainty in long-term effectiveness of measures","Mitigation":"Develop adaptable solutions and contingency plans for changing risk levels","Technologies":"Adaptive crowd management systems, flexible infrastructure design","People":"Risk experts, building managers, service providers","Owner":"Risk experts, building managers, service providers"}]}
